snippet: Two approaches to giving credit where credit belongs online were announced at the South by Southwest Interactive festival in Austin.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column on ownership of content in the world of new media, where 'curation' and 'aggregation' rule; two approaches to giving online credit where credit is due are announced at the South by Southwest Interactive festival in Austin, Tex.
lead_paragraph: Two approaches to giving credit where credit belongs online were announced at the South by Southwest Interactive festival in Austin.

headline.seo: Guidelines Proposed for Content Aggregation Online
headline.main: A Code of Conduct for Content Aggregators
headline.print_headline: A Code Of Conduct For Web Aggregators

keywords.value: South by Southwest Music and Media Conference
